name: HKQuantityAggregationStyle
desc: Constant values that describe how quantities can be aggregated over time.

items.name: case cumulative
items.desc: Cumulative samples that can be summed over time.

items.name: case discreteArithmetic
items.desc: Discrete samples that can be averaged over time using an arithmetic mean.

items.name: case discreteTemporallyWeighted
items.desc: Discrete samples that can be averaged over a time interval using a temporally weighted integration function.

items.name: case discreteEquivalentContinuousLevel
items.desc: Discrete samples that can be combined over a time interval by computing the equivalent continuous sound level.
